trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of drawings that can be operated upon as a single drawing.
trans-unit.target: 단일 그리기로 작업할 수 있는 그리기의 컬렉션을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Use a DrawingGroup to combine multiple drawings into a single, composite drawing.
trans-unit.target: DrawingGroup를 사용 하 여 여러 그리기를 단일 복합 그리기로 결합 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Unlike other <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objects, you can apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> setting, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A>, or a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> to a DrawingGroup.
trans-unit.target: 다른 달리 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>개체를 적용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>설정을 <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>DrawingGroup에.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>

trans-unit.source: The flexibility of this class enables you to create complex scenes.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 유연성을 사용 하면 복잡 한 장면을 만들 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Because DrawingGroup is also a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>, it can contain other DrawingGroup objects.
trans-unit.target: DrawingGroup 이기도 하므로 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>, 다른 DrawingGroup 개체를 포함할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objects, see [Drawing Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>개체 참조 [그리기 개체 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the DrawingGroup class provides several special features: DrawingGroup objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Freezable 기능:** 에서 상속 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>클래스 DrawingGroup 클래스는 여러 가지 특수 기능을 제공: DrawingGroup 개체를 여러 개체 간에 공유로 선언, 성능 향상을 위해 읽기 전용, 복제 및 가집니다 될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 제공 하는 다른 기능에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체 참조 [Freezable 개체 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> class.

Opens the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> in order to populate its <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children*>. This method enables you to append additional <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children*> to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 열립니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> 채우기 위해 해당 <> </> *> 합니다. 이 메서드를 사용 하면 더 추가할 수 <> </> *>이 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must close the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext> before you can render this <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> that you can use to describe the contents of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> 이 내용을 설명 하기 위해 사용할 수 있는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> to apply to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
For more information about bitmap effects and how they work, see [Bitmap Effects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: 기본값은<xref uid="langword_csharp_ null" name=" null" href=""></xref>합니다.

To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> objects that are contained in this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The z-order of the child items in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> is determined by the order of the child items in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection> <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection> 의 하위 항목 순서에 따라 결정 되</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> 는의 하위 항목의 z 순서

trans-unit.source: Each child drawing is under the next child in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 각 자식 그리기는 컬렉션의 다음 자식 중입니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> objects in this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
The default is an empty <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the clip region of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이의 클립 영역을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Drawings outside the geometry are clipped from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> when it is rendered.
The geometry does not have to be rectangular; for example, you can use an <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry> to clip to an elliptical shape.
trans-unit.target: 기 하 도형을 사각형; 될 필요가 없습니다. 예를 들어, 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>을 타원에 맞춰 잘라 내기를.</xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> operations are applied in the following order: 1.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A> 2.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> 3.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A> 4.
ClipGeometry 5.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> 6.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that is used to clip this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> 이 자르는 데 사용 되는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry*> dependency property.
To be added.
Creates a modifiable deep copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> and makes deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: 이 항목의 수정 가능한 전체 복사본을 만듭니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> 값의 전체 복사본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 읽기 전용의 수정 가능한 복사본을 만드는 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings even though they might no longer resolve.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 종속성 속성을 복사할 때 이러한 요소는 더 이상 확인 하는 경우에 리소스 참조와 데이터 바인딩을 복사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: It does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 애니메이션이 나 애니메이션의 현재 값을 복사 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 복제 된 개체의 속성을 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 경우에는 <> </> *> 원본의 속성은<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable deep copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> object and makes deep copies of its current values.
trans-unit.target: 이 항목의 수정 가능한 전체 복사본을 만듭니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> 개체 및 현재 값의 전체 복사본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 읽기 전용의 수정 가능한 복사본을 만드는 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, and animations, although it does copy their current values.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 리소스 참조, 데이터 바인딩 및 애니메이션을 복사 하지 않지만 이러한 요소의 현재 값은 복사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 복제 된 개체의 속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 경우에는 <> </> *> 소스 속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GuidelineSet"></xref> to apply to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A> of this <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> is applied after the GuidelineSet.
As a result, the GuidelineSet is transformed along with the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: guidelineset이 있는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> 내용과 함께 변환 되는 결과적으로,

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GuidelineSet"></xref> to apply to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the opacity of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이의 불투명도 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of `1` specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> is completely opaque; a value of `0` specifies that it is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: 값이 `1` 지정는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>은 완전히 불투명 함; 값이 `0` 완전히 투명 하 게 임을 지정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: A value that is less than 0 is treated as 0, and a value that is larger than 1 is treated as 1.
trans-unit.target: 0, 0으로 처리 되 고 1 보다 큰 값은 보다 작은 값은 1로 처리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Another way to control the opacity of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> is to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity%2A> of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity%2A>해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity%2A> 지정 하는 것</xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> 의 불투명도 제어 하는 방법

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> operations are applied in the following order: 1.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A> 2.
Opacity 3.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A> 4.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A> 5.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> 6.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 1, inclusive, that describes the opacity of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이의 불투명도 설명 하는 값 0과 1 사이의 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is `1`.
Gets or sets the brush used to alter the opacity of select regions of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 선택 영역에 대 한 불투명도 변경 하는 데 사용 되는 브러시를 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> is mapped to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
The opacity value of each pixel of the mapped <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> is used to determine the resulting opacity of each corresponding pixel of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 매핑된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> 의 상응 하는 각 픽셀의 결과 불투명도 결정 하는 데 사용 되</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> 는 각 픽셀의 불투명도 값

trans-unit.source: Only the opacity value of each color in the brush is used for this processing; all other color information is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 브러시의 각 색의 불투명도 값만이 처리;에 사용 됩니다. 다른 모든 색 정보는 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The opacity that this property specifies is multiplied with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 지정 하는 불투명도과 곱해집니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about opacity masks and how they work, see [Opacity Masks Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 불투명 마스크 및 작동 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [불투명 마스크 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> operations are applied in the following order: 1.
OpacityMask 2.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> 3.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A> 4.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A> 5.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that describes the opacity of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> indicates that no opacity mask exists and the opacity is uniform.
